```{r}
#| echo: false

library(ggplot2)
library(tidyverse)
library(tidymodels)
library(gt)
library(MASS)
library(patchwork)
library(moderndive)


obese <- read.csv("DAProject10.csv")
obese$Sex <- as.factor(obese$Sex)
```

## Introduction

# Exploratory Analysis

```{r}
#| echo: false

 ob_tbl <- obese |> 
   summarize(
   "Mean.Age" = mean(obese$Age),
   "Median.Age" = median(obese$Age),
   "SD.Age" = sd(obese$Age),
   "Perecent.male" = mean(obese$Sex=="Male")
 )  |>
   gt() |>
   fmt_number(decimals = 2)

 ob_tbl
```
